name: Shards
description: Shards are items that is part of the $(l:ore_processing/quadrupling)4x Ore Processing$(/l) and beyond.$(p)There may be more shards than the ones listed in your modpack. This is because mods like JAOPCA adds ore processing compatibility with other modded ores if applicable.$(p)The ones listed are based solely on Mekanism and Vanilla ores.
